Description: Marketing / ticketing title of the production (e.g., Nutcracker, Swan Lake, Alice in Wonderland).
Notes / Source System: From history_city_sales.csv [Show Title]; canonicalise against ticketing system.

Description: Internal unique ID for each production title (across seasons).
Notes / Source System: Create title dimension, map to ticketing 'production' or 'event' IDs.

Description: Artistic season label for the production (e.g., 2024–25).
Notes / Source System: From season planning sheets / ticketing season codes.

Description: City of performance (Calgary, Edmonton).
Notes / Source System: Implied by separate columns in history_city_sales.csv; normalise into a City dimension.

Description: Name of venue where production is performed.
Notes / Source System: From ticketing performance setup (e.g., Southern Alberta Jubilee Auditorium).

Description: Total sellable capacity for venue and configuration (per performance).
Notes / Source System: From venue/production setup in ticketing; needed for % capacity features.

Description: Number of performances of this title in a given city/run.
Notes / Source System: Aggregate from performance-level table in ticketing system.

Description: Total number of performances across both cities for the run.
Notes / Source System: Sum performance_count_city across cities.

Description: Production type category (e.g., full-length classical, mixed bill, contemporary narrative, family).
Notes / Source System: Define taxonomy with Artistic & Marketing, tag all historical titles.

Description: Live orchestra, recorded track, guest band, etc.
Notes / Source System: From production notes; influences perceived value and pricing.

Description: Index for how familiar the music is to a general Alberta audience.
Notes / Source System: Combine expert scoring with external consumption metrics (Spotify, YouTube).

Description: Index of narrative familiarity (e.g., Nutcracker high, new creation lower).
Notes / Source System: Expert ratings + Google Trends search interest.

Description: Cluster label grouping titles with similar brand positioning (holiday, romantic classic, edgy contemporary, etc.).
Notes / Source System: From prior clustering work and marketing segmentation.

Description: Whether production is marketed as suitable for children/families.
Notes / Source System: From marketing copy and series labelling (e.g., family series).

Description: Number of days between first and last performance in a city.
Notes / Source System: Derived from performance schedule.

Description: Representation of price zones and spread (e.g., number of tiers, premium differential).
Notes / Source System: From ticketing price tables.

Description: Average list price for standard adult single tickets (before fees/discounts).
Notes / Source System: From ticketing price tables; summarise per city and title.

Description: Share of tickets sold on promo/discount vs full price.
Notes / Source System: Requires promo flag at ticket level; aggregate per title/city.

Description: Whether production features a named guest star (dancer, choreographer, band).
Notes / Source System: From artistic contracts and marketing materials.

Description: Whether this is a world premiere / new creation.
Notes / Source System: From artistic archives.

Description: Whether production is a co-production with another company.
Notes / Source System: From contracts / artistic notes.

Description: Total single tickets sold for a title in Calgary for a given run.
Notes / Source System: history_city_sales.csv [Single Tickets - Calgary].

Description: Total single tickets sold for a title in Edmonton for a given run.
Notes / Source System: history_city_sales.csv [Single Tickets - Edmonton].

Description: Total single tickets sold across both cities.
Notes / Source System: history_city_sales.csv [Total Single Tickets] or compute from city columns.

Description: Total tickets (singles + single tickets) across both cities.
Notes / Source System: Key demand target candidate; combine single and single ticket totals.

Description: Average tickets sold per performance in a city.
Notes / Source System: Requires performance_count_city; tickets / performance_count_city.

Description: Percentage of capacity sold (tickets / theoretical capacity).
Notes / Source System: Needs capacity and performance counts; useful for normalisation.

Description: Lagged total tickets for the same title in prior seasons.
Notes / Source System: Join by show_title_id and season; used for recurring titles like Nutcracker.

Description: Trend in sales for recurring titles across multiple seasons.
Notes / Source System: Compute slope via regression over historical seasons.

Description: Flag for first presentation vs revival of a title.
Notes / Source System: From artistic archives; interacts with prior sales features.

Description: Weeks before opening when 80% of capacity was sold.
Notes / Source System: Requires dated transaction and on-sale data.

Description: Tickets sold in first 48–72 hours after on-sale as % of run capacity.
Notes / Source System: From transaction timestamps; a leading indicator of demand.

Description: Share of tickets sold in final 7 days before opening.
Notes / Source System: From transactions; useful for behavioural segmentation.

Description: Distribution of sales by channel (web, phone, box office, group).
Notes / Source System: From ticketing channel codes; summarise as percentages.

Description: Share of tickets sold via group bookings.
Notes / Source System: From group booking flag in ticketing.

Description: Share of complimentary tickets vs paid.
Notes / Source System: From comp flag; important for interpreting raw ticket counts.

Description: Percentage of tickets refunded or cancelled for the run.
Notes / Source System: From refund transactions; may correlate with weather or health events.

Description: Unique ID for the main marketing campaign associated with the production.
Notes / Source System: From CRM / email or marketing automation tools.

Description: Paid marketing spend allocated to the production per city.
Notes / Source System: From marketing budget spreadsheets / finance.

Description: Total paid digital ad spend (Meta, Google, programmatic) for the run.
Notes / Source System: From ad platform exports or agency reports.

Description: Number of distinct email campaigns sent promoting the production.
Notes / Source System: From email marketing platform logs.

Description: Total email sends for campaigns linked to the production.
Notes / Source System: From email platform stats.

Description: Average open rate across relevant email campaigns.
Notes / Source System: From email performance reports.

Description: Average click-through rate across relevant email campaigns.
Notes / Source System: From email performance reports.

Description: Number of social posts tagged to the production.
Notes / Source System: From social scheduling/analytics tools.

Description: Engagement (likes/comments/shares) per impression across production posts.
Notes / Source System: From social media analytics.

Description: Total views of trailers / promo videos.
Notes / Source System: From YouTube, Instagram, etc.

Description: Whether out-of-home media (billboards, transit ads) were used.
Notes / Source System: From media plans / invoices.

Description: Presence of media partners (radio/TV promotions, contests).
Notes / Source System: From marketing partnership records.

Description: Any price-based promotion (early-bird, dynamic discounts, rush tickets).
Notes / Source System: From promo setup in ticketing and campaign briefs.

Description: Number of tickets sold under promo codes / special offers.
Notes / Source System: From ticketing promo code reports.

Description: Days between campaign launch date and first performance.
Notes / Source System: Requires campaign start dates from marketing calendar.

Description: Percentage of email recipients who purchase after campaign exposure.
Notes / Source System: Link CRM exposure to sales; may require matchback process.

Description: Use of retargeting/dynamic remarketing for the production.
Notes / Source System: From digital agency / ads manager.

Description: Date of first performance in the run (city-level).
Notes / Source System: From performance schedule in ticketing.

Description: Date of final performance in the run (city-level).
Notes / Source System: From performance schedule in ticketing.

Description: Share of performances by day of week (Thu/Fri/Sat/Sun).
Notes / Source System: Derived from performance_date for all performances in run.

Description: Run overlaps with major holidays (Christmas, Easter, Thanksgiving, Family Day, etc.).
Notes / Source System: Compare run window to Canadian/Alberta holiday calendar.

Description: Run overlaps with school breaks (winter/spring) for Calgary/Edmonton school boards.
Notes / Source System: Requires school calendar data.

Description: Major events in city (Stampede, major concerts, playoff games) overlap run.
Notes / Source System: From city events calendars and NHL schedule.

Description: Month of opening (1–12).
Notes / Source System: Derived from opening_date.

Description: Fiscal or calendar quarter of the run.
Notes / Source System: Derived from opening_date and internal fiscal calendar.

Description: Days between on-sale date and opening night.
Notes / Source System: Requires on-sale date from ticketing.

Description: Month in which tickets first went on sale.
Notes / Source System: Derived from on-sale date.

Description: Share of performances categorised as evening vs matinee.
Notes / Source System: From performance start times.

Description: Percent of performances on Fri–Sun vs Mon–Thu.
Notes / Source System: Derived from schedule.

Description: Other Alberta Ballet productions overlap in same city/run window.
Notes / Source System: Compare run windows across all productions.

Description: Unemployment rate in Alberta during run period.
Notes / Source System: From Statistics Canada Labour Force Survey; use monthly or quarterly value aligned to run.

Description: Consumer Price Index for Alberta (inflation proxy) at time of run.
Notes / Source System: From StatsCan CPI for Alberta; align to month of opening.

Description: Real GDP growth rate for Alberta in the season year.
Notes / Source System: From Alberta Treasury Board and Finance or StatsCan.

Description: Average WTI oil price during the run or season.
Notes / Source System: From Bank of Canada or EIA historical oil price series.

Description: Index summarising extreme weather during run dates in each city (e.g., cold snaps, major snow).
Notes / Source System: From Environment Canada daily weather data.

Description: Categorical index of COVID-19 restrictions in place during run.
Notes / Source System: Derive from Alberta public health order timelines.

Description: Average CAD–USD exchange rate during season.
Notes / Source System: From Bank of Canada FX rates.

Description: Population of Calgary/Edmonton in given year.
Notes / Source System: From StatsCan or municipal estimates.

Description: Median household income in Calgary/Edmonton.
Notes / Source System: From StatsCan Census / income tables.

Description: Nanos consumer confidence index for Prairies region (Alberta proxy).
Notes / Source System: From Bloomberg Nanos Canadian Consumer Confidence Index via nanos_consumer_confidence.csv.

Description: Bank of Canada commodity price energy index (A.ENER) - critical for Alberta economy.
Notes / Source System: From Bank of Canada commodity_price_index.csv (A.ENER column).

Description: CPI-based inflation adjustment factor relative to 2020 baseline.
Notes / Source System: Computed from Bank of Canada boc_cpi_monthly.csv using V41690973 (CPI All-items).

Description: City-level median household income from census data.
Notes / Source System: From Calgary/Edmonton 2021 census files in demographics/.

Description: Live Analytics engagement factor by show category (category-level audience engagement multiplier).
Notes / Source System: Computed from audiences/live_analytics.csv via get_category_engagement_factor(); based on historical audience engagement patterns by category.

Description: Percentage of total charitable giving directed to arts organizations (Nanos/Stone Olafson donor research).
Notes / Source System: From audiences/nanos_arts_donors.csv; annual giving breakdown metric showing arts sector share of donor dollars.

Description: Proxy index for visitor volume (hotel occupancy, airport arrivals).
Notes / Source System: From Travel Alberta or city tourism data.

Description: Normalised Google Trends index for production title/theme during campaign window.
Notes / Source System: From Google Trends for terms like 'Nutcracker ballet Calgary'.

Description: Indicator of arts sector health (attendance/financial trend proxy).
Notes / Source System: Would require data from peer organisations or sector surveys.

Description: Sum of predicted attendance for events in the city during the run window (sports, concerts, community events).
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Events API; aggregated within run date range and city radius.

Description: Predicted attendance for sporting events during run window (NHL, CFL, etc.).
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Events API filtered to sports category.

Description: Predicted attendance for concerts and performing-arts events during run window.
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Events API filtered to concerts/performing-arts categories.

Description: Count of significant events (rank >= 30) during run window in city.
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Events API; count of events above rank threshold.

Description: Estimated local consumer spend generated by events during run window.
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Spend API; sum of event-driven spend in USD.

Description: Maximum PredictHQ rank of events overlapping the run window.
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Events API; highest-impact event rank (0–100).

Description: Average PredictHQ rank of significant events during run window.
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Events API; mean rank of filtered events.

Description: Flag indicating major holidays overlap run window (PHQ holiday categories).
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Events API holiday categories (public-holidays/school-holidays).

Description: Flag indicating severe weather advisories during run window.
Notes / Source System: From PredictHQ Severe Weather API for the city.

Description: Composite demand impact score for the run window (combines attendance and spend).
Notes / Source System: Derived from PredictHQ features; custom weighted composite of attendance and spend.
